tool_description: This API will enable you to analyze emotional intensities based on Ekman Emotions. It is powered with BASLA, NLP Engine by dert®.
name: Basla Emotion Analysis
title: Basla Emotion Analysis

api_list.name: Health Check Request
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://basla-emotion-analysis.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "basla-emotion-analysis.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://basla-emotion-analysis.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "basla-emotion-analysis.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
